com.verilion.object.mail
Class SmtpMail

java.lang.Object
  com.verilion.object.mail.SmtpMail

public class SmtpMail
extends java.lang.Object

Allows creation and sending of smtp mail, including attachments. Does not require any third party jars for talking to smtp server

Dec 8, 2003

Author:
tsawler
